Chukwuebuka "Chuks" Anyaduba (amụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa atọ, afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'anọ (Machị 27, 1984) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọka iwu, onye ọrụ ebere na onye ndụmọdụ njikwa ọrụ. Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ puku abụọ na ise (2015), Side Effects na-egosi mmetụta ndị ọzọ nke ọrịa kansa prostate.
A mụrụ Anyaduba na Onitsha na Onitsha North Local Government Area nke Anambra Steetị
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke iwu na Mahadum Abuja na Naịjirịa
Dị ka onye na-agụsibeghi akwụkwọ, Chukwuebuka bụ nwa akwụkwọ nwa akwụkwọ ika nnọchiteanya  na-edu maka Nokia
Ọ malitere ma mee mkpọsa na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ụdị ndị ọzọ  dịka BlackBerry na Chivita
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Anyaduba malitere na MNET Africa mgbe ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri TV kachasị ogologo nke Africa Tinsel
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood
O mepụtara ihe nkiri abụọ The Onye mmekọ na Mmetụta dị n'akụkụ

Anyaduba bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke TOG Media Consults, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, mmepe ọdịnaya na mmepụta ihe omume. Ọ haziri ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe omume gụnyere; Nigeria Radio Awards, African Achievers Awards (2011 na 2012), Ndị na-eto eto CEO Business Summit (2014), Daalụ maka ndị nna,, Warri ọzọ, Ọgbakọ Afrịka na-eto eto (2017), Seyi Tinubu Empowerment Project (STEP) na Nigeria Roadsafety Forum.

Anyaduba na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nduzi ọrụ nke Ned Nwoko Ọrụ mkpochapụ ịba, atụmatụ nke Ned Nwoko Foundation. Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke International Security Cooperation na Onye isi mgbasa ozi dijitalụ na African Bar Association. Ọ bụ onye njikwa nkà maka egwu rap na ihe nlereanya Descushiel.

Anyaduba bụ onye na-akwado Ebumnuche mmepe na-adịgide adịgide nke United Nations na onye guzobere International Initiative for the Advancement of SDGs in Africa (IIASDG), otu NGO nke na-akwalite Ebumnuche mmepe na-adịgide adịgide nke United Nations na Africa. Ọ bụ onye malitere ụfọdụ ọrụ nkwado nke gụnyere; Daalụ maka ndị nna; Ihe omuma banyere ọrịa cancer prostate, Nigerian Road safety Forum na Naịjirịa iji mee ka a mara banyere ụzọ ndị na-aga ije na nchekwa nke Ụmụaka na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ, Na-eji kpakpando agba agba; Ihe omume inye ego maka ndị ọrịa Sickle cell, wdg. Ọ bụ onye nduzi maka oru ngo na mmekorita na Ụlọ ọrụ nkwado Sickle Cell Africa, otu NGO mba ụwa nke dị na US

Dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta maka The Good Fathers Foundation, ọ haziri ọrụ dị mma nke Lita nke Light Project, Mmepe obodo na ọrụ nkwado mmadụmaka ndị nna na ụmụaka na-enweghị nna na mmekọrịta ya na Mahadum Nottingham UK na Litre of light. Na afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asaa (2017) Izu nchekwa okporo ụzọ United Nations, ọ haziri ọrụ SAFECROSS; Mmata n'ebe ndị mmadụ na-agafe na Naịjirịa na nkwado nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ozi United Nations (UNIC) na Lagos Nigeria.
Anyaduba nwere mmasị na SDGs, Ahụike, Agụmakwụkwọ na Nkwado Ndị Ntorobịa
Ọ bụ ugbu a Kọmishọna Maka Ndị Ntorobịa Nigeria na Onye otu Board nke Global SDGs Ndị ntorobịa Summit Board
Site na IIASDG, o guzobere SDGMpaghara mgbasa ozi Africa ma hazie mbipụta atọ (3) na Naijiria, Liberia na Ghana ma na-eme atụmatụ iwere ya gafee mba ndị ọzọ n'Africa.
